Judul: PROPOSED MARKETING STRATEGY FOR NATURAL COSMETICS AND BEAUTY CARE PRODUCTS COMPANY (Study Case: Zebo)
Abstrak:
Zebo is a small new business company dealing in the natural cosmetics and beauty care products in Jakarta, Indonesia. Delivering the key competitive advantage as the pioneer of artisan custom natural cosmetics to meet every skin needs, Zebo enables the customers to create their personalized natural cosmetics and beauty care products as they wish. As the first player in the custom natural cosmetics and beauty care products in Indonesia, Zebo wish the successful product launch for its first product line so that needs proper marketing strategy to address the problem. 

In chapter two, the researcher evaluated the company internal and external situation using a questionnaire, deep customer interview, market segmentation, javelin board, business model canvas, strategic brand analysis and PorterÃ‚Â’s five forces to generate SWOT Matrix. Based on the situational analysis, the results of the SWOT Matrix are keyed in to TOWS Matrix to generate the strategy needed by the company to be implemented. 

There are four alternative strategies in each quadrant that possibly execute by the company which is SO Strategy, ST Strategy, WO Strategy, and WT Strategy. As a business solution in this research, the researcher recommends the company to immediately execute the proposed strategies in SO and WO quadrant in TOWS Matrix. These strategies are the most suitable to do first time based on companyÃ‚Â’s situation and condition currently. 

The conclusion chapter explained deeper technical steps to be able to execute the strategy proposed. It is contains project management team, timeline implementation, budgeting plan and content marketing calendar plan. The timeline is sets for a year period except for content marketing calendar plan.
Kata Kunci: Digital marketing, Marketing strategy, Market development, Market penetration.
